com.soctec.soctec.achievements

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soctec.soctec.achievements.Stats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Stats contains information about game progress
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Joakim Schmidt, Carl-Henrik Hult
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Stats.UserPair
      A UserPair is used by the recently scanned list in Stats, to pair a usercode and a scantime together
